title: UK to study options if Syria's Assad uses chemical weapons again - foreign minister
text:
UK to study options if Syria's Assad uses chemical weapons again - foreign minister 3:28pm BST - 01:39 
Boris Johnson says the UK Prime Minister's decsion to join th U.S. and France in its airstrikes in Syria was the right thing and that Britain would study its options if chemical weapons are used again. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
